biotools.summary: Collection of protein interactions for which high-resolution three-dimensional structures are known. The interface residues are presented for each interaction type individually, plus global domain interfaces at which one or more partners (domains or peptides) bind. The web server visualizes these interfaces along with atomic details of individual interactions using Jmol.

bioschemas.name: 3DID database of 3D interacting domains
